text: These posol; my zehnat some z them inak than others. For vzor, GOD spoke do jeden my chov some z them do higher ranks My dat Jesus syn Mary profound zazrak supported him Holy Spirit Had GOD willed ich followers nie boj each inak, zretelny proofs pojdem them! Radsej they disputed themselves; some z them verit some disbelieved Had GOD willed they nie boj. Everything bol v accordance s GOD's will
